p: Digitised collection records from 4,312,554 vouchered herbarium specimens in the Australian Virtual Herbarium (AVH) were accessed via the Atlas of Living Australia (ALA) application programming interface http://api.ala.org.au/. Analyses were limited to terrestrial, higher-plant taxa native to Australiaâ€™s mainland states and Tasmania (excluding offshore island territories, such as Norfolk, Christmas, Lord Howe, Macquarie and Heard Islands).
